frontmatter.title: CrawlerX
frontmatter.description: The CrawlerX is a platform which we can use for crawl web URLs in different kind of protocols in a distributed way. Web crawling often called web scraping is a method of programmatically going over a collection of web pages and extracting data which useful for data analysis with web-based data. With a web scraper, you can mine data about a set of products, get a large corpus of text or quantitative data to play around with, get data from a site without an official API, or just satisfy your own personal curiosity.
